text:
CoachUp | Boston, MA | coachup.com/careers | Senior Software Engineer (Full stack) | Full Time

CoachUp is the largest platform for sports training services, helping Athletes across all sports and age groups to find high-quality Private Coaching. We are seeking an innovative, entrepreneurial, and genuinely nice person to join our collaborative team. If that describes you, we want to hear from you! A career at CoachUp offers countless ways to grow and have a real impact on the world of Sports.

We have been in business for over 4 years and are looking to expand our engineering team to keep up with market demand.
